info.description: This is a core sever of PROMPT.
info.title: PROMPT Core API

put.description: Batch update the status of multiple applications

Get the application form for an authenticated user

post.description: Post an application for a student (authenticated)

post.description: Post an application for a student (external, unauthenticated)

get.description: Check if the user is a student of the course phase

put.description: Update multiple course phase participations at once

get.description: Get the participation of the current user in a course phase

get.description: Get a specific participation by course phase and participation ID

put.description: Update a specific course phase participation

get.description: Get all courses accessible to the user

put.description: Update the data for a course

put.description: Update the participation data graph for a course

get.description: Get all participations for a given course
get.summary: Get all participations for a course

Get the phase data graph for a course

Create a new custom group for a course

get.description: Get all students in a specific group for a course

Search students by a search string

for batch updates, the ID is in the body
